item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:
Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my blog. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)
...or something like this:
The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.
As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: Lambswool Rich Jumper
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Designed in-house in our London studio by our dedicated menswear team, ASOS offer a range of men’s clothing designed and created exclusively for ASOS.

item.title: Noose & Monkey Velvet Blazer
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Noose & Monkey run with the concept ‘there are two sides to every story’, forging an interest in mistaken identity and disguise. With a collection of highly detailed suiting, Noose & Monkey use bold colours, cut and sew details and plush velvets to create their unique line of jackets with signature printed linings and lapel pins, tailoring and trousers.

item.title: Blazer with PU Lapel
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Directional, exciting and diverse, the ASOS Collectionmakes and breaks the fashion rules. Scouring the globe for inspiration, our London based Design Team is inspired by fashion’s most covetable trends; providing you with a cutting edge wardrobe season upon season.

item.title: Warehouse Organza Top
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Delivering seasonal trends for the high street, Warehouseoffer a collection of directional pieces, with vibrant prints and clean cut tailoring channelling the brand's signature style. Statement party dresses sit alongside classic wardrobe staples, all complemented by a key range of jewellery and accessories, including an exclusive edit of three satchel bags.

item.title: Superdry Logo Hoodie
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: With a fusion of Japanese design influences and American styling, Superdry breathe fresh life into casual womenswear. Coloured denim, jersey dresses and jersey t-shirts come in bold colour pops and relaxed fits, keeping theSuperdry aesthetic feminine and laidback.

item.title: Boyfriend Sweatshirt
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Directional, exciting and diverse, the ASOS Collectionmakes and breaks the fashion rules. Scouring the globe for inspiration, our London based Design Team is inspired by fashion’s most covetable trends; providing you with a cutting edge wardrobe season upon season.

item.title: Stussy T-Shirt With Thug
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Originally founded by surfboard shaper Shawn Stussy in 1980, the Stussy label now represents everything about new wave beach culture. Inspired by music and pop culture,Stussy has been at the forefront of shaping a new generation of surf movement, collecting a following of celebrity artists, DJs and musicians along the way. Look to a collection of hoodies, t-shirts, caps and bags all emblazoned with founder Shawn Stussy's signature.

item.title: Tour Baseball Top
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Originally founded by surfboard shaper Shawn Stussy in 1980, the Stussy label now represents everything about new wave beach culture. Inspired by music and pop culture,Stussy has been at the forefront of shaping a new generation of surf movement, collecting a following of celebrity artists, DJs and musicians along the way. Look to a collection of hoodies, t-shirts, caps and bags all emblazoned with founder Shawn Stussy's signature.

item.title: Paul Smith Jeans T-Shirt
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: After an accident ended his promising cycling career, Paul Smith was propelled in to the world of fashion. Famed for his mantra "classics with a twist", Paul Smith has been at the forefront of the menswear scene for over thirty years, captivating audiences with his creative style and quirky detailing.
item.excerpt:encoded: Pellentesque habitant morbi tristique senectus et netus et malesuada fames ac turpis egestas. Vestibulum tortor quam, feugiat vitae, ultricies eget, tempor sit amet, ante. Donec eu libero sit amet quam egestas semper. Aenean ultricies mi vitae est. Mauris placerat eleifend leo.

item.title: Textured Flippy Dress
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Delivering seasonal trends for the high street, Warehouseoffer a collection of directional pieces, with vibrant prints and clean cut tailoring channelling the brand's signature style. Statement party dresses sit alongside classic wardrobe staples, all complemented by a key range of jewellery and accessories, including an exclusive edit of three satchel bags.

item.content:encoded: Pellentesque habitant morbi tristique senectus et netus et malesuada fames ac turpis egestas. Vestibulum tortor quam, feugiat vitae, ultricies eget, tempor sit amet, ante. Donec eu libero sit amet quam egestas semper. Aenean ultricies mi vitae est. Mauris placerat eleifend leo.

Donec eu libero sit amet quam egestas semper. Aenean ultricies mi vitae est. Mauris placerat eleifend leo.

item.content:encoded: Directional, exciting and diverse, the ASOS Collectionmakes and breaks the fashion rules. Scouring the globe for inspiration, our London based Design Team is inspired by fashion’s most covetable trends; providing you with a cutting edge wardrobe season upon season.

item.content:encoded: Borne out of the British dance scene of the late 1980s, British label Boxfresh channel youth culture, innovative design and street style in their vibrant menswear collections. item.title: G-Star Denim Shirt Dress
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Famed for their work with raw denim jeans, pioneers G Star, utilise innovative techniques to create new styles and cuts. In accordance with the label's 'just the product' philosophy, the covetable G Star jean collection fuses sophisticated craftsmanship with street edge, to produce a varied palette of washed and untreated denims. Adopting an architectural approach to denim design, G Star's extensive range of cuts sits alongside their clothing line, reflecting the label's signature utilitarian style.

item.title: Primark Short Sleeve Shirt
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Primark, we can’t imagine a British high street without it, and now the retail phenomenon joins ASOS as part of our round up of high street brands. Bringing you up-to-the-minute fashion, quality and prices that won't bring tears to your eyes, Primark offer up an award-winning range of affordable fashion, from denim, chinos and jeans, to shirts, printed t-shirts and sweats.

item.title: Bellfield Parka Jacket With Fur
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: nspired by vintage outerwear, Bellfield offers well-constructed modern womenswear with a sense of fun and adventure. Designed by a small London-based team of creatives, Bellfield draw from classic British heritage wear and old American work wear via contemporary Japanese design, featured across a timeless collection of t-shirts, gilets and outerwear.
